name: rex
description: rex is a Really EXcellent way to build webapps

scripts.docker:db:sync: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml run api npm run db:sync
scripts.docker:db:sync-force: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yml run api npm run db:sync-force
scripts.test: npm run ui:test && npm run docker:api:test
scripts.docker:api:test: docker-compose -f docker-compose-test.yml run api npm run api:test
scripts.docker:api:watch:test: docker-compose -f docker-compose-test.yml run api npm run api:watch:test
